trans-unit.source: Represents a data view in the data store.
The DesignerDataView class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView 클래스 디자인 타임에 데이터 저장소의 스키마를 구성 하는 여러 형식 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너를 구현 하 여 이러한 스키마 항목 컨트롤에서 사용할 수는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>인터페이스.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 스키마 개체 액세스 제어는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>인터페이스의 메서드에.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataView class represents a single data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView 클래스는 데이터 저장소의 단일 데이터 뷰를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of DesignerDataView objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataView 개체 컬렉션을 호출할 때 반환 되는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>메서드는 `schemaClass` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName> 로 매개 변수 설정</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"> </xref> 지정 된 이름의 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name and owner.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"> </xref> 지정 된 이름 및 소유자는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The data-store owner of the view.
